title: One Crazy Dog: The Tale of the Missing Sock
description: Have you ever owned a dog that's just a little crazy? If so, then you will definitely relate to this story about a silly dog named Jack. He never failed to get himself into trouble! This is an easy read for children of all ages and families to read and enjoy together. Jack will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end! Let's be honest, who couldn't use a little laughter from a dog...especially during this time. Even though Jack was One Crazy Dog, he will always hold a special place in my heart.
author: Emily  Davis
